emotion.translate: эмоция, чувство, волнение, душевное волнение, возбуждение
mnemonic:
motion ['məʊʃ (ə) n]
***
Во время движения "motion"
мы получаем перемещение "remotion",
продвижение "promotion"
и хорошие эмоции "emotion".
examples: She was good at hiding her emotions.
Her voice was full of emotion.
Jealousy is an ugly emotion.
Mind reluctates any emotion.
His face worked with emotion.
His face twitched with emotion.
She was overtaken by emotion and started to cry.
She saw the emotion in her father's face and knew her words had struck home.
My breast heaved with emotion.
a wave of emotion swept over him
I was too choked with emotion to speak.
Laughter is one of the most infectious expressions of emotion.
She was overcome with emotion at the news of her friend's death.
She swallowed back a tide of emotion.
He was in the grip of a powerful emotion.
She displayed no emotion on the witness stand.
The stadium was a seething cauldron of emotion.
He conducts the choir with great skill and emotion.
The reliving of a strong emotion can be therapeutic.
The defendant showed no emotion when the verdict was read.
He searched her face, hoping to see some glimmer of emotion.
For the actors, the goal was a paradox: real emotion, produced on cue.
Such displays of emotion were once considered womanish and unseemly for a man.
